name: All-Star Fruit Racing
summary: All-Star Fruit Racing is the kart racing game you’ve been waiting for! Easy to learn but hard to master, choose your character, customize your kart and play the way that tempts you most!
info:
• 中文名: 全明星水果卡丁车
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 发行日期: 2017年9月4日
  • 售价: $14.99
  • 官方网站: https://www.allstarfruitracing.com/
